Name: The Blue Box
About the game: The Blue Box is host to a collection of individually purchasable games: Make burgers with physics to earn minimum wage in BurgerGame . Negotiate the price of food items as a llama in Llama goes to Market . Realize the full extent of humanity in YWDH . Race against other ostriches to escape the police in DDAFPST Ostriches . Play basketball across the globe in BBA SLAM . Go back in time to snap some sweet pics of creatures in Oligocene Snapshot . Pilot a futuristic jet at breakneck speeds through a sci-fi city in Normality . The Blue Box is also host to a gallery of toys and other completely free game experiments: Raise your virtual forever friend in Pocket Dootie . Live a day in the life of a fabric weaving friend in Pube Spider (I Love You) . More and more games are being added over time, thanks to everyone's support.
